description:
Hello!

I am glad to offer this session in Brussels for the very first time. We have being doing this in Gent for a while and now we would like to share this opportunity with the spiritual community in Brussels. Are you in?...

On this session (free of charge) your will receive the following:

01 Introduction to the Pranic Healing technique with Demonstration included.
02 Introduction and Practice of the Meditation on Twin Hearts

These 2 techniques together can bring a tremendous amount of energy and well being to your life. Out of this experience you can expect to have even more mental clarity, inner peace and willpower to manifest your projects.

Please ask any question you may have,

You are welcome.

Peter.s. @life with awareness.

01 - Pranic Healing

02 - Meditation On Twin Hearts

You are welcome!

venue.name: Vrije Universiteit Brussel (VUB)
venue.address_1: Pleinlaan 2 / Boulevard de la Plaine 2, 1050 Elsene/Ixelles Building Y’ KK GalerY’, above the Kultuurkaffee

how_to_find_us: Between entrances 6 en 7 on the Triomflaan / Boulevard du Triomphe.

name: Recharge your Energy with Pranic Healing and Meditation On Twin Hearts

description:
Would you like to explore the fantastic and useful world of energy healing? We Invite you to become a Pranic Healer. This course will provide you with the necessary tools and techniques to balance your energy. During the class we will perform several exercises to understand the theory and to get a clear sense of the use of energy for healing purposes. 

This workshop is to learn how to use the Pranic Energy, also known as life energy to revitalize the physical body by cleaning and energizing the Aura and the Chakras. 

This clase includes a 300+ pages book with all theory and healing protocols. This empower the students to practice and do healing right after the workshop. In additon, future sessions to practice will be organized after the class.  

First Day (10.00 to 17.30): Basic principles, concepts and introduction to the Pranic Healing technique. The system of the 11 Mayor chakras and the human aura.

Second Day (10.00 to 17.30): Meditation on twin hearts, divine-healing, self-healing and distant healing.

Key topics 
• The system  of 11 Major Chakras and their physical body relation

• The Pranic Healing technique by Master Choa Kok Sui

• Self-Healing and Distant-Healing 

• Divine Healing 

• Twin Hearts Meditation and Super Brain Yoga for Global Peace and Illumination


Important: This class requires no knowledge, skills or affinity with healing, energy or meditation.

The Workshop Vision 

The bioplasmic body or energy body around the physical body can be affected by using Pranic Healing Energy, this workshop is to teach you the modern technique of Pranic Healing by Grand Master Choa Kok Sui. This experience will increase your mental and emotional well-being, inner peace and mental clarity.

You are welcome!

Certified Instructor for Belgium (5 years of experience) : Peter Moreno 
Email: [masked] 
Course Details: http://inner4innovation.com/the-workshops/1-basic-pranic-healing/

Principles of Pranic Healing

01 It is not intended to replace traditional medicine but to complement it.

02 It is a no-touch based energy healing technique.

03 It is based on the life force energy (or prana).

04 It uses the system of 11 chakras to clean and energize the energetic body.

05 It is safe and extensively proven in more than 22 countries.
how_to_find_us: The final location is to be confirmed upon registration
name: Learn How to Heal With Energy - Basic Pranic Healing Course

description:
Hello!

We continue to offer this opportunity to recharge your energy and get fully energized by this simple and powerful technique. 

We will also celebrate the Wesak Festival - Full Moon. This a very important spiritual event. It is related with the descent of spiritual energy for the whole planet. This happens only once a year, do not miss it. If you decide to be part of this event you will be also contributing with the service of blessing the entire earth with peace, reconciliation and harmony. 

On this session you will get an introduction to theTwin Hearts Meditation. This practice includes physical exercises before and after the meditation, so it is healthy for the body and your soul.  No previous experience is needed. 

These are the benefits of the Meditation on Twin hearts:

• Reduces stress.

• Increases contentment, happiness, inner peace and joy in life. 

• It improves your response to relationships by increasing awareness.

• Increases physical and inner strength. 

• Opens awareness to the infinite reservoir of energy and creativity that lies deep within everyone. 

• Cleanses and strengthens the chakras and auras (thereby makes the body on all levels stronger and more dynamic). 

• Increases mental clarity, intelligence and comprehension skills.

Please do not hesitate to ask questions. 

You are welcome to join.
name: Recharge your Energy with the Meditation on Twin Hearts, Wesak Version

description:
Hello!

I am glad to offer this session in Brussels. We have being doing this in Gent for a while and now we would like to share this opportunity with the spiritual community in Brussels. Are you in?...

On this session (donations based) your will receive the following:

01 Introduction to the Pranic Healing technique with Demonstration included.
02 Introduction and Practice of the Meditation on Twin Hearts

These 2 techniques together can bring a tremendous amount of energy and well being to your life. Out of this experience you can expect to have even more mental clarity, inner peace and willpower to manifest your projects.

Please ask any question you may have. If you are looking for energy healing please ask for a private session.

You will be welcome with light, love and healing blessings!

01 - Pranic Healing
How to scan your aura, chakras and keep them clean, balanced and energized.

02 - Meditation On Twin Hearts
A wonderful tool for self-healing and global service. Your aura and chakras will be energized and balanced after this practice. This is very healthy.

You are welcome!

Peter.s. @Enjoy with awareness.

My website:
www.inner4innovation.com

description:
Hello Group of People Open for new experiences in the round of Energy and Healing.

I would like to invite you to a very special event that will combine Energy Healing, Meditation, Music and Angels.


This session is based on the teachings I received during my education as Pranic Healer. You do not need to have previous experience to attend this session, you just need a heart open and desire for healing of any area of your life or in your physical body.

If you have any questions please do not hesitate to post them in the group.


You are welcome to invite your friends and love ones. They may value the experience as much as you!

With love and openness,

Peter.

name: Learn How to Heal With Energy - Basic Pranic Healing Course

description:
Lovely people open and receptive to the world of Energy and Healing,

I would like to invite you to this event, which is an inspiration of mine to contribute with healing for the world issues we have today. When we heal something within us this is reflected into the world as peace, reconciliation and forgiveness. I have tested this in my personal relationships, it works.

How is your relationship with your own being, and with others, with your parents, friends, children, couple and co-workers, etc?. Are they providing you satisfaction?... Do you have the need to forgive or let go old resentments?  Well, this session will be an space to contribute with this, we will practice Pranic Healing for relationships healing and much more.


I have come to learn that deep happiness and satisfaction in Life comes from the happy moments we share with the ones we love, and when our relationships with our fellows human beings do not work, we have the tendency to feel sad and depress. 

On this session I would like to generate, together with your divine presence, an space forself-reflection, the cleansing of our energetic links with others and therefore relationships healing.


This event is based on donations only. Totally free and not mandatory.

I welcome your divine presence on this session

With love and gratitude,

Peter.s.
name: Healing Your Relationships & Pranic Healing

description:
Lovely Group of Human Beings with a Magical Souls,

First of all, thanks for your time and attention to read this invitations, I hope to contribute to your life with inspiration and new ideas to have a more fulfilling life.

On this new session I would like to share with you a wider perspective about this provocative subject, how to sustain a healthy relationship with your Couple? What is love? What are the stages of this feeling in love experience? and what happen after that?.... 

Well, these are some of the questions I would like to address together with you. We will be sharing new perspectives and interpretations for what is to be in loving, respectful and freer Couple Relationship. 

Additionally, we will continue to practice Pranic Healing, to do demonstrations and to enjoy this wonderful technique for Energy Healing. I love sharing this ancient knowledge with you and with your receptivity it is possible to have great experiences!!!...

If you feel like this session can contribute with your friends, brothers or sisters, please invite them. They will feel gratitude of you for giving them the opportunity to experience this session.

With care and inspiration,

Peter.s.

We welcome your Divine Presence on this Session.

This event is base on donations only. 

You are free to contribute at the end of the session. It is giving that we receive, it is forgiving that we are forgiven. When we take the courage to give to others what we hope to receive (love, time, attention, listening) from them, we open the doors for abundance in your life, we allow the flow of life to manifest through us and therefore all our needs are met.
name: Healthy Couple Relationships & Pranic Healing

description:
Lovely group, 

Thanks for your presence in our last session. I hope the information was useful and now you have even more tools to have a more fulfilling couple relationship. This is a path of evolution that you may decide to walk, hope you got inspired. 


On this new session I would like to invite you to have a transformative experience, an opportunity to experience a non-ordinary state of consciousness. You can come to this session even if you have not been presence on the previous sessions.

Past life regressions are useful when we use them to heal issues we encounter in our current life. This may be the experience you need to evolve and release old patters that are preventing you for having healthy relationships in your life. Give it a fair try!!!

You will be very welcome to this session, be ready for more surprises, to get energized and to have a magical experience. We will start at 20.00 hrs.

Any questions? I will be happy to answer and help where I can,

If you feel like inviting your friends or people you think might be benefit from this event, please invite them, they will be grateful for the experience.

With love and my heart full of service,

Peter.s.
name: Past life regression to Health our Relationships &  Pranic Healing

description:
Gently people with energy awareness,

This is the invitation to Join the first Pranic Healing class in Brussels, and the first time we divide the class in 4 days/evenings. You will have time to practice between each class. Here are the details:

We have limited spot available for this class, therefore I invite you ask in your heart if this workshop is for you. If so you will be very welcome and energized.

Day 1 - Module 1 & Intro to Module 2
August 27th 
Basic Principles (Aura, Prana, Energy Healing)
How to heal simple Ailments

Day 2 - Module 2 & Module 3

11 Chakras System , Pranic Breathing, Advance topics.

Day 3 - Review & Module 4

Day 4 - Review & Module 5

http://inner4innovation.com/the-workshops/1-basic-pranic-healing/

Any question please do not hesitate to ask:

With enthusiasm,

Peter.s.
name: Basic Pranic Healing Workshop - Module 1

description:
Hello Lovely Group!

This invitation is for the first session we will offer in September, the month dedicated to talk and explore this fantastic subject. Life purpose, why are we here on this planet? what is the purpose of our life?, and where are we going to?...

Well, I would like to share a particular perspective with all of you, it is founded on human psychology and spirituality. This information will be very useful to expand your perspectives and to provide you with new possibilities to expand your current life purpose.

Life is an interpretation, and the more you grow in consciousness the broader are your interpretations and therefore the wider is the range of your opportunities. 

In addition, on this session I would like to share with you a beautiful and inspiring Spiritual Tarot I received in Chile. I am sure you will love it. This can be a tool you can use in your daily life to guide your inner states and interpretations to your experiences. Come to discover it!!!

I welcome your divine presence on this event,

Important: As usual we will start the session with a short demonstration of Pranic Healing. I share this technique with all of you because I believe it can add tremendous value to your human and spiritual life.

This session is based on donations only, you are free to come and invite anyone you feel or thing might be interested on this wonderful subject.

With love and enthusiasm,


Peter.s.
name: Expand Your Life Purpose and Spiritual Messages for Inner Guidance

description:
Lovely Group!

This will be the second session around this subject during September 2014. It is not necessary to have attended previous sessions to join this one. You are very welcome.

On this session we will explore an archetypical vision of life and its manifestation. An archetype is collection of though from that generates living being. come to this session to explore this fantastic subject and its relation to your Life Purpose.

Some questions we will explore together during this session:

01. Which Archetypes have you incarnated? With their light and shadow. 

02. Which Archetypes do you still need to embody? To manifest your life purpose.

03. The process of archetypical transformation and how to navigate in them.

Come to discover your particular Archetypes and its effect in your life. You will also see what are the main 4 archetypes that locks the manifestation of your life purpose. You will enjoy this session.

Important: As usual we will start the session with a short demonstration of Pranic Healing. I share this technique with all of you because I believe it can add tremendous value to your human and spiritual life.

This session is based on donations only. Invite your friends and love ones, they will appreciate the consciousness of this session and will feel gratitude for your invitation!

See you!
name: Your Life Purpose and The Journey of the Archetypes

description:
Lovely Group!

Here is an update on this session. Hope this message finds you well and with energy. At any case, you will be very welcome on this session. I promised you will be recharged with energy and new ideas for life after this session.

We will start this session with a practice on the Twin Hearts Meditation, then we will offer a Pranic Healing demonstration in case there are new people in the group. Or if someone is having any special request for healing.

Then, we will dive into the last perspective on Life Purpose that I would like to share this week. Here are some ideas to inspire you to come over:

01. The Chakras and their wisdom 

02. How they participate on our life Purpose

03. Technique and practices to develop healthy Chakras 

As usual this session is based on donations only, so please feel free to contribute at the end of the session. Invite your friends or love ones, they will be grateful for the experience. We have seen this happening in previous sessions.

With care,

Peter.s.
name: Life Purpose and the Wisdom of the Chakras.

description:
Welcome to the month of October 2014!

Lovely group!

This month we will organize couple of events. The theme would be: how to reconnect with our deep longings and manifest them in peace with oneself on others.

Your presence is welcome!!! This month you can become the Powerful Co-Creator of your Reality. This requires inner transformation, a higher level of consciousness and inner growth. Most people want everything, but they do not want to change anything. If you are ready for a positive change this is the month for you.

We will start the month with this session – Past Life regression to Health Your Inner Child.

The past life regression we did on relationships was very successful; many people reported a considerable changes in their life. Past life regressions can help us to solve issues in previous life that are still affecting our current behavior and therefore, our present life.

On this session we will focus on our Inner Child. Everybody has an Inner Child and when healthy, she/he gives us the experience of inner satisfaction and innocence for life. This is key to enjoy simply things and to live with a more relax attitude. Have you notice that sometimes we are too serious about life?... If you feel or think that you need to heal some aspects of your past, then come to this session, you will benefits from it.

Your friends and love ones are also welcome. We have seen many people coming and leaving the sessions with a gently smile and very surprised for the outcome. You can also increase your vibrations while being part of these events.

This session is based on donations only, you will be asked to contribute with what for your is right at the end of the session. Enjoy it, soon the sessions will have a fix price.

With love, care and openness,

Peter.s.
name: Past life regression (Inner Child Healing) -  Pranic Healing Demonstration

description:
Lovely Group,

This is a follow up session on the subject of this month, how to become the Powerful Co-Creator of your Reality?... Come even if you did not atended the previous session.

I would like to offer a session on this fantastic subject. I have many stories and examples to inspired you on this wonderful spiritual discipline: The Co-Creation of your Life. 

This session will be full of practical techniques and tools that you will be able to apply right after the session. 

Success is complete only when is coming together with an spiritual development that brings inner stability and strengths. Reaching success is relatively easy, but sustaining healthy success and growth is the challenge.

I invite you to come and share this space of consciousness, energy and expansion with the beautiful groups we are forming together.

01. Relaxation, Meditation and Healing
02. What is sustainable success in modern life?
03. The Principles of success
04. The Spiritual Laws of success
05. Tools, practices and techniques

I welcome your divine presence in the room. Invite your friends, people you care about and your love ones, they will express gratitude to you for the experience. This has been the experience of many people. 

You are welcome!!!

With care,

Peter.s.
name: Spiritual Abundance & Success to Co-Create Your Reality

description:
Gently people with energy awareness,

This is the invitation to Join the second Pranic Healing class in Brussels, the first one went quite well. We have other 3 Pranic Healers in Brussels already.  Would you like to join this community that is just starting? Would you like to be part of it right from the beginning?. The results you can achieve with Pranic Healing are simply amazing, every day I get more surprise!


Here are the details in case you feel attracted to this energy world. No previous knowledge or experience is required.


The class is divided in evenings. You will have time to practice between each module.


We have limited spots available for this class, therefore I invite you ask in your heart if this workshop is for you.If the answer if YES will be very welcome, heal  and energized during this 4 sessions.

name: Basic Pranic Healing Workshop - Module 1

description:
Dear group,

This is an invitation for people that is willing to spend one lovely afternoon in Leuven. We will be offering an introduction to meditation on twin hearts and energy healing for students at the Leuven University. If you have time for this one you will be very welcome.

I apologize for the short notice, live is being active at my side. Hope to reconnect with you soon,

In the next days I will posting more events and also a free tcon/webinar that you can join from home!... we will find new ways to stay connected during the winter... :-)...

Thanks for reading and if you have any question plz ask,

With love,

Peter.s.
name: Twin Hearts Meditation to Recharge Your Energy

description:
Hello Lovely Group,

With this invitation I would like to offer you a complete program of 4 sessions, including a full day retreat to focus on this fantastic subject. Check the full agenda below and also the web site link.

My intention with this program is to share with you a set of tools, practices and insights I have collected to live a life with more capacities to manifest what you really want in our life. This in connection with your True Self and not just your personality.


For this to happen you need more than just visualization techniques, you need to embrace a new way of looking at life and your personal capacities. On this program you will have a great opportunity to expand your self-knowledge and creativity!

You deserve a life with abundance in all areas, and if you would like to be more satisfy, empower and content with your life, this workshop will support you on your journey.


Website with details: http://inner4innovation.com/2014/10/02/683/

Key Experiences
# Awaken the Powerful Co-Creator of your reality that it is within YOU
# Connect with your deep longings in life, with your soul agenda!
# Learn how to manifest your reality from your heart
# Learn how to work with your sub-conscious mind to reprogram your thinking
# Receive a Bach flower remedy to facilitate the process (optional)
# Get a Crystal to disintegrate impediments, negative beliefs and old patterns
# Set of practices and messages to manifest your reality

Dates – Time

Nov. Fri 21 – 19:45 hrs
Nov. Fri 28 – 19:45 hrs
Nov. Sat 29– 10:00 to 18.00 / Antwerp / Great location you will love it.
Dec. Fri 12 – 19:45 hrs

Logistic – Investment

Sessions of 3 hrs
1 Full day retreat / In a great yoga space in Antwerp
Food during brakes included, lunch during retreat is up to you
Investment – 200 EUR (up to 4 payments of 50 EUR / including room rent, food, materials)

Modules

First session – Fri 21 -  Awaken your Inner Co-Creator

• Introduction to how to become the Powerful Co-Creator of your Reality

• Cultivate your Inner Connection

• Discover your deep longings – Integral Approach

• First set of practices to manifest your reality (4 of 12)

• Delivery of Bach Flowers, Crystals and body-work recommendations


Second session – Fri 28 - Alignment with your Soul Agenda and deep Longings

Website with details: http://inner4innovation.com/2014/10/02/683/

Third session – Sat 29 - Embrace the Consciousness of Abundance

Website with details: http://inner4innovation.com/2014/10/02/683/

Integration session - Fri 12 – Come to Practice as a Group

Website with details: http://inner4innovation.com/2014/10/02/683/

You are welcome to join this program. You can expect to me more aware, empower and resourceful after this program. Invite the people you love or care about, they will also enjoy it !!!

With love and care,

Peter.s.
name: Program: Learn how to manifest your reality and deep longings

description:
Hello lovely group,

This event will be in spanish but, and if there are english speaking people that is also interested we will book an event in English too. So, please let me know, I will be looking forward to your comments.


En español:

Este evento es para experimentar un estado no ordinario de consiencia que nos permita viajar a vidas pasadas con la intención de reparar, sanar e integrar experiencias que llevamos en nuestros corazones y en nuestro vivir.

Cuando sanamos algo en esta vida o en otras, esto tiene un efecto en nuestro comportamiento y por ende nos abre las puertas para vivir con mayor felicidad y apertura de corazón.

Este evento de día completo será una oportunidad para vivenciar una sanación profunda de la relación con nosotros mismos y las personas en nuestras vidas.

Agenda

10.00 - Bienvenida
10.30 - Introducción
11.00 - Primera regresión - Sanación de tu autoestima
12.30 - Almuerzo liviano - Incluido en el costo del event

13.30 - Relaciones sanas e insanas
14.30 - Segunda regresión - Sanación de tus relaciones
16.00 - Trabajo grupal
17.00 - Integración
18.00 - Cierre

Este evento te ayudará a vivir con mayor consciencia, más pleno y plena, te invito a que te hagas este regalo para tu crecimiento y caminar en la tierra.

Inversión que incluye comida y costo de arriendo del recinto, el lugar es hermoso te va a fascinar.

Normal - 50 EUR.
Estudiantes - 25 EUR.

Estaré feliz de contar con tu sagrada presencia en este evento. Tus preguntas son muy bienvenidas.


Con amor y entrega,

Peter.s.
name: En Español - Un día de regresión a vidas pasadas y sanación de relaciones
